findValueInDocument

public static java.lang.String findValueInDocument(org.jdom.Document document,
                                                   java.lang.String path)
Finds the value of a specified element within the provided document.

Parameters:
document - the document within which the element will be found
path - The path to find the document. The path shoud be provided in the following format.

<namespace>:<elementName>|<namespace>:<elementName>

Example:
ns1:userName|ns2:password

if no namespace is availabel ignore the element.
Example:
ns1:userName|password

Returns:
value of the element
